pkgmetadata.longdescription: Win Ratio Analysis of Composite Time-to-Event Outcomes // Implements various win ratio methodologies for composite endpoints of death and non-fatal events, including the (stratified) proportional win-fractions (PW) regression models (Mao and Wang, 2020 doi:10.1111/biom.13382), (stratified) two- sample tests with possibly recurrent nonfatal event, and sample size calculation for standard win ratio test (Mao et al., 2021 doi:10.1111/biom.13501).
